title: [CTM] CryptoTrafficMarket
author: [CTM] CryptoTrafficMarket
created_time: October 16, 2023, 01:02:07 PMLast edit: November 04, 2024, 07:46:16 PM by [CTM] CryptoTrafficMarket

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Op I advise, announcements like this should also be posted in service inside the market board because, that's the main place where services are announced to the public due the amount of traffic you'll get from that board. And for you to make sure others sees your thread you must keep bumping so the thread will appear on the top page of the board.Quote from: [CTM] CryptoTrafficMarket on October 16, 2023, 01:02:07 PM3) BITCOINTALK FORUM- We will create an engaging ANN (Announcement) forum topic for your project.- Daily posts and a minimum of 5 daily interactions will be managed to maintain continuous activity. Your topic will always be among the top threads.When it comes to advertising in this forum, ANN alone will not get you much traffic compared to when your using a signature campaign or a review to attract forum members. And besides making topic among the top thread isn't your doing but rather the choice of other forum members.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: I'm pretty sure if you raised $250M you wouldn't be here. Other nitpicks, your Twitter account is suspended. You have 29 followers on insta. What you mentioned about Bitcointalk is not how promotions happen here. You have typos on your website [1]. If you can't take care of your own website, how do you expect others to trust you to make proper campaigns for them? [1] https://www.talkimg.com/image/FeNrI

Your topic will always be among the top threads.You are offering Bitcointalk ANN thread creation but you dont even know where to put your ANN thread and how it works?

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: I have read some of your previous ANN topics and you publish the topic and pump it every now and then, but that is not enough here. Unless a member before me pumps the topic, it will not be ranked in advance or among the TOP TOPIC. Promotion does not necessarily require the presence of the advertisement, but rather the professionalism in publishing it, as I do not find that you have experience or a team in preparing a visual identity or at least some illustrative forms. Instead of written text

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: If you needed an advertisement that can guarantee having results using a reputable platform, then i will strongly recommend going for a signature campaign, this is done on this forum and many organizations and businesses do make use of this opportunity to announce themselves to the world about what they offers, there are other social media platforms we can make use of from our official handle from them, we can also get to hire an influencer in taking it to the next promotional level.

comments.author: bluebit25
comments.body: Quote from: [CTM] CryptoTrafficMarket on October 16, 2023, 01:02:07 PM(...)Make sure to explore our new package services, carefully curated to provide a balanced approach that aligns with your goals and helps you reach new heights. It's also a fantastic opportunity to save on your marketing investment.Best regards,CTM TeamIf you are looking for customers, analyze whether your product is being approached properly. I'm all for offering marketing services from some developers in the crypto space, but not in a spammy way on every platform.Furthermore, if you look at this service, I think the target audience will also be very narrow, because today's startups work very professionally and sometimes stereotypically, so product marketing is always an important part of any crypto.

comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: my first impression was that the domain is a media broker. it's a team providing package services that include shilling!  services like this seem like adoption has come. in the past, only the bounty managers were the ones making proposals for the project, and bounty hunters get to have a share of the bounties. but now it seems like these service provider is not sharing it with the bounty hunters.
